text:
Marian Franciszek Jaworski (, 21 August 1926 – 5 September 2020) was an Ukrainian-born Polish Cardinal Priest. He was Archbishop of Lviv of the Latins in the Roman Catholic Church from 1991 until 2008. He was born in Lviv, Ukraine.
Jaworski died on 5 September 2020 in Krakow, aged 94.

annotations.surface_form: Archbishop of Lviv of the Latins
